text:
Selena Gomez visits "The Morning Mash Up" for a special 'Celebrity Session' on SiriusXM Hits 1 Channel at SiriusXM Studios on June 5, 2017 in New York City.

Her latest song arrives Friday.

The social-media hype around Selena Gomez's upcoming Gucci Mane-featuring single "Fetish" continues with a new snippet, unveiled on the pop star's Twitter on Tuesday (July 11). But unlike the track's previous teases, this one finally includes part of the song's audio.

A new 16-second clip offers fans a close-up of Gomez's heavily glossed lips as she sings what we're assuming to be part of the highly anticipated track:

"Take it or leave it/ Baby take it or leave it/ But I know you won't leave it/ Because I know that you need it/ Look in the mirror/ Now look in the mirror/ Baby, I see it clearer/ Why you want to be nearer," the 24-year-old croons.

After dropping a string of teasers for the track, including a video preview shot in a suburban neighborhood and images of Gomez wielding grocery bags next to a broken-down car, "Fetish" is set for release Friday.

Until then, check out the new clip, below.
title: Selena Gomez Offers Up First Audio Taste of 'Fetish': Listen
